statements: DELETE FROM WindFarms WHERE latitude > 40 AND wind_speed < 10;
DELETE FROM wind_farm_locations WHERE latitude < 40 AND longitude > -100;
DELETE FROM wind_farm_locations WHERE latitude > 40.0 AND longitude < -100.0;
DELETE FROM WindTurbines WHERE location_id = 10 AND brand = 'TurbineCo';
DELETE FROM WindTurbines WHERE height > 100 AND brand = 'BrandX';
DELETE FROM Turbines WHERE model = 'Model X';
DELETE FROM Turbines WHERE model = 'ModelX' AND height > 100;
